content: अपौरुष --पौरुषेय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Unmanly, cowardly, timid. {@--2@} Superhuman, not of the authorship of man, of divine origin; अपोरुषेया वेदाः; अपौरुषेयप्रतिष्ठः सुवर्णबिंदुरित्याख्यायते <ls>Māl. 9.</ls> not set up by (the hand of) man. --षं, --षेयं {@--1@} Cowardice, pussilanimity. {@--2@} Superhuman power.
